alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 03 at 2:46PM CST until December 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow will come to an end early this evening. Any additional accumulation should be under an inch. Temperatures have already fallen below freezing across the northern portion of the county this afternoon, and the southern portion of the county will fall below freezing early this evening could cause roads to become icy tonight. * WHERE...Door County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
